articles.description: According to reports, Xiaomi is looking to pack plenty of impressive hardware within the Redmi K50 Pro Plus. Supposedly, the handset will feature the Snapdragon 898, a 108 MP camera, 120 W charging and a 5,000 mAh battery. Even a periscope camera and an in-di…
articles.content: Much has already been made of the Redmi K50 series, including that the handsets may arrive as soon as December 2021. Reputedly, the base model will launch with a Snapdragon 888 SoC and a 64 MP main c… [+1240 chars]
